TaskDescription: Upgrade your previous program, so when photocell detects workpiece, entry piston will push it forward. First, click DEL (C on keyboard) to remove previous NewWorkpeace. -Enclose your code in if statement, where ToggleSwitch is not activated. -Detect PhotocellEntry's rising edge with the help of two variables. -Use (TON-Timer On Delay) to wait 1 second after edge detection to not open the valve to soon. -Use (TOF-Timer oFF Delay or TP-Timer Pulse) timer to trigger signal for 3 seconds so the piston is fully extended In the next tutorial, we will automaticly return the piston back to the starting position. -Start testing, just after you spawned new workipece.

ChatBubbles.Text: When coding, use RESTART button to reset the scene. Don't forget starting the compressor!
